item.title: BEAM Tools
item.description: What is BEAM Tools ? beamtools is a set of software which install Erlang and Elixir version ready to use. Without waste time compiling the most up-to-date versions. It is available for Linux users and is an alternative for the Erlang and Elixir installation methods. Currently, when we want to install Erlang and Elixir we have a few choices: delegates to Linux distribution packages. While the install process is easy and usual, The available versions could not be the latest one build using version management tool like [kerl]kerl.
